00067 class EGS_EXPORT EGS_RandomGenerator {
00068

00078     EGS_RandomGenerator(int n=128);

00085     EGS_RandomGenerator(const EGS_RandomGenerator &r) : np(0) {
00086         copyBaseState(r);
00087     };
00088 
00093     virtual ~EGS_RandomGenerator() {
00094         delete [] rarray;
00095     };
00096 
00103     inline EGS_Float getUniform() {
00104         if (ip >= np) {
00105             fillArray(np,rarray);
00106             ip = 0;
00107         }
00108         return rarray[ip++];
00109     };
00110 
00116     EGS_I64 numbersGenerated() const {
00117         return count;
00118     };
00119 
00125     EGS_I64 numbersUsed() const {
00126         return ip<np ? count - np + ip : count;
00127     };
00128 
00138     inline void getAzimuth(EGS_Float &cphi, EGS_Float &sphi) {
00139 #ifndef FAST_SINCOS
00140         register EGS_Float xphi,xphi2,yphi,yphi2,rhophi;
00141         do {
00142             xphi = 2*getUniform() - 1;
00143             xphi2 = xphi*xphi;
00144             yphi = getUniform();
00145             yphi2 = yphi*yphi;
00146             rhophi = xphi2 + yphi2;
00147         }
00148         while (rhophi > 1);
00149         cphi = (xphi2 - yphi2)/rhophi;
00150         sphi = 2*xphi*yphi/rhophi;
00151 #else
00152         EGS_Float phi = 2*M_PI*getUniform();
00153         cphi = cos(phi);
00154         sphi = sin(phi);
00155 #endif
00156     };
00157 
00161     inline EGS_Float getGaussian() {
00162         if (have_x) {
00163             have_x = false;
00164             return the_x;
00165         }
00166         EGS_Float r = sqrt(-2*log(1-getUniform()));
00167         EGS_Float cphi, sphi;
00168         getAzimuth(cphi,sphi);
00169         have_x = true;
00170         the_x = r*sphi;
00171         return r*cphi;
00172     };
00173 
00188     static EGS_RandomGenerator *createRNG(EGS_Input *inp, int sequence=0);

00196     static EGS_RandomGenerator *defaultRNG(int sequence=0);

00230     void resetCounter() {
00231         count = 0;
00232     };

00290     int  baseSize() const {
00291         return 2*sizeof(EGS_I32) + sizeof(EGS_I64) + sizeof(bool) +
00292                sizeof(EGS_Float) + np*sizeof(EGS_Float);
00293     };
